TopicTitle: Unable to zoom out in VAB

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: Lazy orbits | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 9 5900X 12-Core | GPU: AMD Radeon RX 6700 | RAM: 32

 

Severity: low

When oriented left or right, according to the orientation cube, the game refuses to zoom out after a certain point. Even when the camera is not close to the VAB walls.

To sidestep the issue, orient camera front/back, zoom out, then bring it to left/right position again.
